channel.title: chisel on Poney Island
channel.description: Recent content in chisel on Poney Island

item.title: HTB - Buff
item.description: nmap _ buff nmap -p- -T4 --min-rate=3000 10.10.10.198 -Pn PORT STATE SERVICE 8080/tcp open http-proxy _ buff nmap -sC -sV -Pn -p8080 10.10.10.198 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 8080/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.43 ((Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1g PHP/7.4.6) | http-open-proxy: Potentially OPEN proxy. |_Methods supported:CONNECTION |_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.43 (Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1g PHP/7.4.6 |_http-title: mrb3n's Bro Hut gobuster _ buff gobuster dir -u http://10.10.10.198:8080/ -w /opt/dictionaries/common.txt Nothing special can be found going to http://10.10.10.198:8080/contact.php, we can read : Made using Gym Management Software 1.

item.title: HTB - Json
item.description: RECKON 220-FileZilla Server 0.9.60 beta Microsoft IIS httpd 8.5 => Windows Server 2012 hostname = JSON message_signing: disabled (dangerous, but default) or not required Website with multiple Dead links: javascripts, images … smbclient -L \\10.10.10.158 -n session setup failed: NT_STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED Connecting Burp-Suite, We can intercept the Login HTTP request, click Action: Send to repeater POST /api/token HTTP/1.1 Host: 10.10.10.158 User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:72.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/72.0 Accept: application/json, text/plain, */* Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.

item.title: HTB - Re
item.description: RECONNAISSANCE Only two ports open: http 80 and smb 445 # Nmap 7.60 scan initiated Mon Feb 10 13:23:35 2020 as: nmap -sC -sV -oA nmap/RE 10.10.10.144 Nmap scan report for re.htb (10.10.10.144) Host is up (0.16s latency). Not shown: 998 filtered ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 80/tcp open http Microsoft IIS httpd 10.0 | http-methods: |_ Potentially risky methods: TRACE |_http-server-header: Microsoft-IIS/10.0 |_http-title: Ghidra Dropbox Coming Soon! 445/tcp open microsoft-ds?
